title: Cannot win a single game, someone help please.
body: Hey guys, a little background information on myself, I was a Bronze 5 player that carried myself into Gold 5 in around 200 games during the preseason, after my placements, I was placed into bronze 1, eventually getting myself to Silver 1, however through various means, playing champions I did not know how to play, I dropped down to Silver V. Now I have been stuck in here for over 100 games. I honestly have no clue what I'm doing wrong, especially now, as I seem to be losing every game.  http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA/35597232 . Since I have gone from bronze to high silver/low gold at least twice, I thought it wouldn't be too hard to do it again, however now I am having doubts. I try my best to keep the team morale up, and play my best, however I simply cannot carry. I'm stuck, if someone please offer advice on how to get better, or any indication of what I'm doing wrong, it would be much appreciated. Thank you.

replies.body: I had a really shit day today, then I duo'd with the mid laner from my ranked 5s. We won 6 straight. Should dup more often lol..

the "carried myself" part made me feel that your not really working with your team. And I see that u had 2 udyr games with triforce that u won and 2 games without triforce that u lost. soo....play more triforce tank udyr

we all have loss streaks,. keep playing
if you truly deserve gold you'll have no problem climbing

main one role - 3 champs

play them as much as you can & watch guides
Remember school holidays have started, the plebs are strong right now.
